Author: servogeek2
Title: [ANN][ICO/AIRDROP][RAVE] Ravelous - The Crypto Ecommerce Marketplace
Body: Updates: We are now listed on Idex, Acceleratorx & Forkdelta exchanges. We have signed up for several new exchanges and will update everyone as we get more information  Our Crowdsale is officially over   We did not raise as much as we had planned for our crowdsale. We believe that the cause is not spending the required time and resources on: - PR sites/Crypto News Sites - Getting Listed on ICO sites Providing Enough information about our Team in BitcoinTalk from the start, and marketing/advertising much earlier in the start of our ICO than we did.   The good news is that the project will continue to move forward    The bulk of the crowdsale funding was meant to support the Treasury to give us a good base floor for the price of each RAVE that we back fast-track our progress and speed on the project.  The better news is that during this fundraising time, we have built up a great community of holders who believe in this project, and have helped us have over 9800 Holders of RAVE tokens.   Question For The Community: The crowdsale (50 million tokens) was also meant to solve the problem token distribution (to remove fears of PnDs). In our whitepaper, we said that whatever remained would go back to the treasury, but since so little has been purchased, we want to hear from you.   Should we:  A) Keep it in the treasury as written B) Use the Tokens to Create more Bounties, Contests, & Airdrop opportunities?

Author: oladapo1
Title: [ANN][ICO/AIRDROP][RAVE] Ravelous - The Crypto Ecommerce Marketplace
Body: What Is Ravelous?  RAVELOUS is a crypto-commerce platform intended to make buying and selling items online in exchange for cryptocurrency simple.  Ravelous was made to help people buy and sell goods for crypto so that they can acquire coins without having to divulge personal information to do so.  The ecommerce platform brings the security and trust systems of the darknet markets, but the ease of use and familiarity of the clearnet (regular internet).  By making cryptocurrency more accessible to the average audience, we hope to gain more usage and widespread adoption of cryptocurrencies beyond trading and long term holding.   https://s17.postimg.org/7n9xzyk4f/ravebanner-whatmakesitspecial.png  What Makes It Special?  What Crypto-commerce requires to gather widespread adoption by sellers and buyers is acceptance of many crypto payment types.  Sellers can accept many types of payments from buyers, and withdraw your balance in the token of your choosing, just as you would on an exchange. Buyers who do not have the currency the sellers prefer can exchange their coins for RAVE tokens which used for payment.  The RAVE tokens can also be traded for other coins, and will have a value backed by the crypto-marketplace and the RAVE treasury that will increase over time as the treasury grows in value.  Community Governed Each new cryptocurrency that gets accepted as payment into the marketplace will be voted in by the community. To help this project go in the best direction, we will setup a community governance model to decide seller fees, what to do with development funds and to maintain the treasury.  The goal of the system is to use the latent talent and resources of our community to create a different way to save and invest in cryptocurrency than through traditional fiat methods or exacting gatekeepers.  Whitepaper Link: http://ravelous.com/whitepaper.pdf You can read more about our reserve/treasury system and what role rave tokens play in our marketplace in our whitepaper.    https://s17.postimg.org/55y6soksf/ravebanner-tokeninformation.png Token Information  Etherscan Smartcontract Info: https://etherscan.io/token/0x6a09e1b7cc5cb52ffdfc585a8df51ced7063915c  Token Name: RAVE Coin Type: ERC-20 Token (Compatible with Myetherwallet, Metamask, etc.) RAVE Supply: 100 MILLION COINS (MAX TOTAL SUPPLY)   https://s17.postimg.org/dbg8qugr3/ravebanner-team.png Our Team  Currently we are a small team of developers and crypto-enthusiasts with experience in ecommerce. You can meet us in the discord where we will be the most active. Most of our development resources will be spent on our roadmap, and we will link the community to a github to show updated progress on development roadmap. We could always use some more help, so if you see a position in the whitepaper team section that you would like to fill in, message us in the discord channel.  https://s17.postimg.org/tmgcn4qnz/ravebanner-roadmap.png  January, 1st - January, 31st 2018 Token Crowdsale (4-5 Weeks) & Initial Airdrop  February, 1st - April, 30th 2018 Hiring full-time team members Creating the underlying exchange & Marketplace  April, 30th - June, 30th 2018 Updating Marketplace Advertising and Marketing Rounds Gathering escape velocity (strengthening buyer and seller volume on the platform)  4th Quarter: 2018 Apple & IOS Release   https://s17.postimg.org/ltpov604f/ravebanner-tokencrowdsale.png  Token Crowdsale  Up to 50 million tokens will be used for the crowdsale, and a separate allotment will be used for the airdrop and bounties.  Any coins undistributed from the crowdsale/airdrop will remain in the treasury for intermediary product transactions.  How the Crowdsale works: During the crowdsale you can buy RAVE for a variable amount of ETH. The earlier someone buys in, the more tokens they receive. When the specified amount of RAVE is sold during the crowdsale, the price for buying RAVE will increase.  We may create some special rewards for crowdfund participants, so we encourage people to participate in the crowdsale.   https://s17.postimg.org/qsd79ow7j/ravebanner-bounties.png Bounties & Contests:  More information on bounties wil  be coming soon! Note: We are looking for someone skilled with coded signatures to help with the bitcointalk forum awareness bounty.   https://s17.postimg.org/hkkyt04kv/ravebanner-airdrop.png  Airdrop: Get up to 200 FREE Rave Tokens: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScWcNqm7RbUuiNNufoQeHqmEtT2lLLDdZ2PtCD44Fjq3yaRZw/viewform

Body: The Crypto Ecommerce Marketplace  Website || Whitepaper || Medium || Discord || Telegram || Reddit || Twitter || Facebook || Github      What Is RAVELOUS?  RAVELOUS is a crypto-commerce platform intended to make buying and selling items online in exchange for cryptocurrency simple. Our Platform is being made to help people buy and sell goods for crypto so that they can acquire coins without having to divulge personal information to do so.   By making cryptocurrency more accessible to the average audience, we hope to gain more usage and widespread adoption of cryptocurrencies beyond trading and long-term holding.        What Makes It Special?  Commerce Without Borders | Full Medium Article The strength of any currency is based on the products and services you can buy with it. At this moment, Cryptocurrency has very few platforms of commerce to trade crypto for products.  Until Widescale services and platforms for crypto are adopted, More money will be sucked out of the Marketcap and swapped for FIAT that is currently more useful to traders lives. Ravelous is working to make getting into as simple as selling stuff you no longer need. This creates liquidity outside of selling direct to fiat methods.  This keeps the coins in circulation, and not collecting into more centralized hands (usually the companies that trade Crypto to Fiat).    Solving Seller Profit Volatility | Medium Article - How Stablecoins Work Ravelous is solving the problem of profit stability by backing our own tokens at a base value. We are able to do this, buy creating a treasury system that takes a percentage of seller fees, and uses them to back the underlying value of each token.  You can read more about our reserve/treasury system and what role rave tokens play in our marketplace in our whitepaper.    Buy & Sell With Many Types of Crypto | Full Medium Article Ravelous uses the exchange system as a layer within our commerce platform. This gives us the flexibility to accept many types of currencies, and help users to sell their items around the home for cryptocurrency.  The RAVE tokens can also be traded for other coins, and will have a value backed by the crypto-marketplace and the RAVE treasury that will increase over time as the treasury grows in value.    Community Governed Each new cryptocurrency that gets accepted as payment into the marketplace will be voted in by the community. To help this project go in the best direction, we will setup a community governance model to decide seller fees, what to do with development funds and to maintain the treasury.  The goal of the system is to use the latent talent and resources of our community to create a different way to save and invest in cryptocurrency than through traditional fiat methods or exacting gatekeepers. Any coins undistributed from the crowdsale/airdrop will remain in the treasury for intermediary product transactions.  How the Crowdsale works: During the crowdsale you can buy RAVE for a variable amount of ETH. The earlier someone buys in, the more token bonus they receive. When the specified amount of RAVE is sold during the crowdsale, the price for buying RAVE will increase.  We may create some special rewards for crowdfund participants, so we encourage people to participate in the crowdsale.        We are a small team of developers and crypto-enthusiasts from the bitcointalk community that have come together to build this resource. You can meet us in the discord/telegram where we will be the most active.
